snippet: Iranian state television accused the BBC on Sunday of trying to steal "artistic, historic and cultural documents" from government archives in the Islamic Republic....

headline.print_headline: Iran State TV: BBC Tried to Steal From 'Archives'
headline.main: Iran State TV: BBC Tried to Steal From 'Archives'

lead_paragraph: Iranian state television accused the BBC on Sunday of trying to steal "artistic, historic and cultural documents" from government archives in the Islamic Republic.
